definitions.definition: a large system consisting of many similar parts that are connected together to allow movement or communication between or along the parts, or between the parts and a control centre:
a number of computers that are connected together so that they can share information:
examples: We've just spent £1.9 million on improving our computer network.

definitions.definition: to connect computers together so that they can share information:
examples: Our computer system consists of about 20 personal computers networked to a powerful file-server.
